metadata.name: My Homebrew Content Pack
metadata.source: Original homebrew or personal book reference

equipment: A component pouch or arcane focus

payload.name: Arcane Geometer
payload.description: Wizards who study the mathematical patterns underlying magic.

payload.title: Arcane Surge
payload.description: A wave of raw arcane energy bursts from your hands. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d8 force damage.

payload.title: Temporal Anchor
payload.description: You mark your current position in time. Until the spell ends, you can use your reaction to return to that moment, regaining hit points equal to any damage taken since casting.

payload.name: Tactical Genius
payload.description: You have a keen mind for battlefield strategy. You gain +1 to Intelligence, and allies within 30 feet gain advantage on their first attack roll each combat.

payload.name: Merchant Prince
payload.description: You were born into a wealthy trading family and learned the art of negotiation from an early age.
equipment: A letter of credit worth 25 gp

feature.name: Trade Connections
feature.description: You have contacts in major trading cities who can provide lodging and information about local markets.

payload.name: Sentinel Stance
payload.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain +1 to AC and can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack when a creature within 5 feet of you attacks a target other than you.

payload.name: Pact of the Grimoire
payload.description: Your patron grants you a magical grimoire containing forbidden knowledge. You learn two additional cantrips from any spell list, and once per long rest you can cast a spell you don't know as a ritual if it appears in your grimoire.

payload.name: Eldritch Barrier
payload.description: When you cast eldritch blast, you can forgo one beam to create a barrier of force. Until the start of your next turn, you have half cover against ranged attacks.

payload.name: Redirected Spell
payload.description: When a spell you cast that targets only one creature misses or the target succeeds on its saving throw, you can spend 2 sorcery points to redirect the spell to a different target within range.

payload.name: Starlight Elf
payload.description: Elves who dwell in observatories atop mountain peaks, studying celestial phenomena. They gain Starlight Vision and a connection to the night sky.

notes: This is a template with example homebrew content.
Replace the examples with your own creations or content you own.
